Replying to @swyx 2021-04-14 23:28
@swyx @Netlify :) The Vlolly idea was a bit different. It used a serverless function to do a render if a view was missing, and also did incremental builds thanks to the build cache. DPR is a far simpler model which adds to a deploy’s assets in the CDN over time as views are first requested. ✨
